manzils.text: Glor est Unu summoned His servant (Muhammad) nokt Sankt Masjid Mecca) al farthest ej de prostration surroundings ni ben en ord montr him kelk da our sign! Li est Hearer Seer
Similarly ni don Moses scripture rendered gxi beacon Infan Israel ke Vi ne set any idol Lord Mastr Me
Ili est descendants de those ni port Noah; li est appreciative servant
Ni addressed Infan Israel scripture Vi commit gross evil ter twice Vi destin fal into great heights arrogance
When 1 temp ven pas ni send vi servants de ours posed great might ili invad your hejm. This est prophecy ven pas
Afterwards ni don vi turn over them supply vi a lot de wealth infan; ni don vi upper man

Vi work righteousness vi work righteousness your own bon se vi commit evil vi do tial your own detriment. Do when sekund temp ven pas ili defeat vi enter masjid just as ili did 1 temp Ili visx out all gajn vi accomplished
Your Lord dusx vi His mercy. Vi revert transgression ni counter retribution. Ni designated Gehenna final abode disbelievers
This Quran direkt put path brings bon news al believers plumb righteous life ili ind great recompense
As por those disbelieve Hereafter ni prepar them painful retribution
human est oft pregx io dolor him opini li pregx io bon. human est est impatient
Ni rendered nokt tag 2 sign. Ni far nokt dark tag lighted ke vi streb provisions your Lord therein. This ankaux establ vi timing sistem means calculation! Ni tiel eksplik cxio en detal
Ni recorded sort cxiu human est gxi lig his kol. Tag Resurrection ni man him record est accessible
Leg your own record Hodiaux vi suffice your own reckoner
Whoever direkt direkt his own bon whoever ir astray does tial his own detriment! Ne sinner bor pek de anyone aux Ni neniam pun 1 send messenger
Ni est annihilate any community ni let estr commit vast corruption therein! Once ili ind retribution ni annihilate gxi completely
Many generaci hav ni annihilated Noah. Your Lord est efficient en dealing kun pek His servants; Li est fully Cognizant Seer
Anyone chooses this fleeting life his priority ni rush him ki ni decid don him tiam ni commit him Gehenna li sufer forever despised defeated
As por those choose Hereafter as their priority work righteousness while kred their efforts sxat
Por each unu de them ni proviz; ni proviz por those these your Lord's bounties. Your Lord's bounties est inexhaustible
(Not kiel ni prefer kelk popol others en this life)! differences Hereafter est far greater far significant
Vi ne set any ali di DI lest vi end despised disgraced
(Your Lord dekret vi ne worship escept Him your parents honor! As long as 1 ambaux them viv vi neniam dir al them Uff slightest gest annoyance) nor shall vi kri them; vi trakt them amicably
Kaj lower por them wings humility kindness dir My Lord hav mercy them ili raised me infancy
Your Lord est fully aware da your innermost thoughts. Vi argument righteousness Li est Forgiver de those pent
Vi don due alms relativ needy poor vojagx alien ne est excessive extravagant
extravagant est brethren diabl diabl est unappreciative de his Lord
Eben se vi turn them vi pursue mercy de your Lord vi trakt them nicest manier
Vi ne keep your man stingily lig your kol nor shall vi foolishly open gxi up lest vi end blamed kaj sorry
your Lord increases provision anyone Li chooses redukt gxi. Li est fully Cognizant de His creatures Seer
Vi ne kill your infan due al tim de poverty! Ni proviz por them tro vi. Killing them est gross offense
Vi shall commit adultery; gxi est gross pek evil behavior
Vi ne kill any ul - Por DI far life sankt! - Escept justice Unu killed unjustly tiam ni don his heir auxtoritat enforce justice Tiel li ne exceed lim vengx murd; li help
Vi ne tusx orf mon escept por their own bon gxis ili reach maturity. Vi fulfill your covenants covenant est great responsibility
Vi don plen mezur when vi meti pes equitably! This est put kaj righteous
Vi ne akcept any information vi verify gxi yourself. Mi don vi auxd eyesight cerb vi est responsible por uz them
Vi ne marsx proudly ter - Vi ne ted ter nor can vi est as tall as mont
All mav behavior kondamn your Lord
This est kelk da wisdom inspir al vi your Lord Vi ne set another di DI lest vi end Gehenna blamed defeated
your Lord don vi knab hav while don angxel daughters!? Kiel vi utter such blasphemy
(Ni cited en this Quran all kinds da ekzempl) ke ili pren heed Gxi nur eg their aversion
Dir tie est any ali di Him as ili pretend ili pen overthrow Possessor tron
Li glor Li est mult tro exalted far super their utterances
Glor Him est 7 univers ter everyone them! tie est nothing ne glor Him vi ne kompren their glorification! Li est Clement Forgiver
When vi leg Quran ni met vi those ne kred en Hereafter invisible barrier
Ni ej sxild their mens prevent them el kompren gxi, deafness their orel! Kaj when vi predik your Lord uz Quran sol ili kur aversion
Ni est fully aware da ki ili auxd when ili auxskult al vi when ili konspir secretly - disbelievers dir Vi sekv crazy hom
Not kiel ili describe vi kiel this kauxz them stray off path
Ili dir Post ni turn into ost er ni get resurrected re
Dir Eben vi turn into rok fer
Eben vi turn into any kind da creation ke vi deem impossible Ili tiam dir Who bring us dors? Dir Unu kre vi en des 1 met, Ili tiam sxancel their kap dir When vol est? Dir est closer than vi pens
Tag Li summons vi vi respond per lauxd Him vi tiam realize ti vi last en this life short while
Tell My servants trakt each ali bon possible manier diabl cxiam pen driv kojn them! Surely diabl est hom ardent enemy
Your Lord kon vi put! His knowledge Li dusx vi kun mercy, Li requite vi. Ni ne send vi est their advokat
Your Lord est put knower de everyone en heavens ter. En accordance kun this knowledge ni prefer kelk prophets others. Por ekzempl, ni don David Psalm
Dir Implore whatever idols vi set Him. Ili ne hav potenc relieve your afflictions nor can ili prevent them
Eben idols ili implore streb voj means their Lord Ili pregx His mercy tim His retribution. Surely retribution your Lord est dreadful
tie ne est community ni ne annihilate Tag Resurrection inflict severe retribution them! This jam skrib libr
Ki stop us el send mirakl est ke previous generaci rejected them! Por ekzempl, ni montr Thamoud kamel profound (mirakl) ili transgressed gxi Ni send mirakl nur instill reverence
Ni inform vi ke your Lord fully controls popol ni rendered vizi ke ni montr vi test popol arb est accursed Quran! Ni montr them solid proofs instill reverence them this nur eg their defiance
When ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam ili fal prostrate Satan. Li dir mi prostrate 1 Vi Shall kre kot
Li dir Ekde Vi honor him me Vi respite me Tag Resurrection mi posed all his descendants a few
Li dir Tiam ir; vi those sekv vi end Infer your requital; equitable requital
Vi entice them your vocx mobilize all your forces all your hom them akci en their mon infan promes them! Anything diabl promes est ne plur than iluzi
As por My servants vi ne hav potenc them. Your Lord suffices advokat
Your Lord est Unu kauxz sxip float ocean ke vi streb His bounties! Li est Merciful towards vi
Vi aflikt mar vi forges your idols sincerely implore Him sol. as baldaux as Li sav vi bord vi revert Ja human est est unappreciative
Vi garanti ke Li hav ne kauxz land bord glut vi? Aux ke Li ne send vi tempest tiam vi ne trov protector
Vi garanti Li hav ne return vi mar re tiam send vi sxtorm dron vi your disbelief? Once this okaz ni ne don vi another sxanc
Ni honor infan Adam proviz them rajd sur land en mar! Ni proviz por them bon provisions ni don them greater avantagx than many da our creatures
Tag ven when ni summon cxiu popol together their record As por those don record righteousness ili do gxi leg their record ne sufer malplej injustice
As por those est blind en this life ili est blind Hereafter eben a lot mav
Ili preskaux diverted vi revelations ni don vi. Ili wanted vi fabricate io aux en ord konsider vi amik
Se ne est ni strengthened vi vi preskaux leaned them just a malpli mord
Hav vi done ti ni doubled retribution vi en this life post death vi trov ne 1 help vi us
Ili preskaux banished vi land get rid da vi ili revert vi las
This est consistently kaz all messengers ni send vi vi trov ke our sistem neniam sxangx
Vi observ Kontakt Prayer (Salat) when sun declines el its alt pint je noon gxi mov sunset. Vi ankaux observ (recitation Quran je dawn Reciting Quran je dawn witnessed)
Nokt vi medit ekstr kredit ke your Lord raise vi honorable rang
Dir My Lord admit me honorable admittance let me depart honorable departure grant me Vi powerful support
Proklam truth prevailed falsehood vanished falsehood inevitably vanish
Ni send down Quran healing mercy believers. Je des sam temp, gxi nur increases wickedness transgressors
When ni ben human est li igx preoccupied heedless. when adversity strik him li torn despondent
dir Everyone works en accordance kun his belief your Lord kon bon which unu direkt dekstr path
Ili pet vi revelation. Dir revelation ven my Lord knowledge don vi est minut
Ni testament ni sorb ki ni revealed vi tiam vi ne trov protector us
This est mercy your Lord His blessings vi est great
Dir Se all humans all jinns band together en ord produkt Quran this ili neniam produkt anything gxi ne materi kiel mult assistance ili lent 1 another
Ni cited popol en this Quran all kinds da ekzempl plej popol insist upon disbelieving
Ili dir Ni ne kred vi vi kauxz risort sxpruc muel
Aux unless vi own gxarden de dat palm grapes river kur tra gxi
Aux unless vi kauxz mes cxiel vi pretend fal us! Aux unless vi bring DI angxel our okul
Aux unless vi own luxurious mansion aux vi grimp cxiel. Eben se vi grimp ni ne kred vi bring libr ni can leg. Dir Glory est my Lord Est mi any plur than human messenger
Ki prevent popol el kred when guidance ven them their dir est DI send human est messenger
Dir Se ter inhabited angxel ni send down them cxiel angxel messenger
Dir DI suffices as witness me vi! Li est fully Cognizant de His worshipers Seer

Whomever DI direkt des ver direkt unu. Kaj whomever Li send astray vi neniam trov them any lords mastr Him. Ni summon them Tag Resurrection forcibly; blind dumb surd! Their destination est Infer; whenever gxi cools ni increase their fajr
Such est their just retribution ekde ili rejected our revelations. Ili dir Post ni turn into ost er ni resurrected neo creation
Ili ne seg DI kre heavens ter est able al kre sam creations? (Ke) Li predetermined them irrevocable life sxpin? disbelievers insist upon disbelieving
Proklam Se vi posed my Lord's trezor mercy vi withheld them tim vi exhaust them! human est est stingy
Ni supported Moses 9 profound mirakl - Pet Infan Israel! When li ir them Pharaoh dir al him mi opini vi Moses sorcx
Li dir Vi kon plen put ke ne 1 manifest these obviously Lord de heavens ter. Mi opini vi Pharaoh doomed
When li pursued them as li pel them land ni dron him together those flank him all da them
Ni dir al Infan Israel afterwards Ir viv this land. When final prophecy ven pas ni summon vi all 1 grup
Truthfully ni send gxi down truth gxi ven Ni ne send vi bearer bon news tro warner
Quran ni released slowly en ord vi leg gxi popol long period ni send gxi down all je once
Proklam Kred en gxi ne kred en gxi. Those posed knowledge previous scriptures when gxi recited them ili fal down their menton prostrating
Ili dir Glory est our Lord This fulfills our Lord's prophecy
Ili fal their menton prostrating plor,! Por gxi eg their reverence
Dir Vok Him DI vok Him plej Gracious; whichever nom vi uz Him aparten bon nom. Vi ne utter your Kontakt Prayers (Salat) tro loudly nor secretly; uz moder ton
Proklam Lauxd est al DI who neniam begotten fil nor does Li hav partner His kingship nor does Li bezon any ally weakness magnify Him constantly
Lauxd DI revealed His servant this scripture far gxi flawless
Perfekt (scripture) avert de severe retribution el Him liver bon news al believers plumb righteous life ke ili earned generous recompense
Wherein ili abide forever
Al avert those dir DI begotten fil
Ili ne posed knowledge this nor did their parents Ki blasphemy ven out da their busx! ki ili utter est gross mensog
Vi blame their response this narration their disbelieving en gxi; vi saddened
Ni ornam cxio ter en ord test them tiel disting those among them work righteousness
Inevitably ni visx out cxio gxi las gxi completely barren
Why aux vi pens ni est do telling vi popol kav numer connected kun them? Ili est our wondrous sign
When youths sorb rifugx kav ili dir Our Lord dusx us Your mercy ben our afer Your guidance
Ni tiam sigel their orel kav por predetermined numer jar
Tiam ni resurrected them seg which de 2 parti count duration their rest therein
Ni narrate vi their histori truthfully. Ili est youths kred en their Lord ni increased their guidance
Ni strengthened their kor when ili bud proklam Our nur Lord est Lord de heavens ter! Ni neniam worship any ali di Him. Otherwise ni est far astray
Here est our popol setting di Him! Nur ili proviz any proof support their bud! Who evil than unu fabricates mensog est atribu them DI
Ekde vi wish evit them their worshipping de ali than DI sorb rifugx kav! Maj your Lord dusx vi His mercy direct vi al des tuj decision

Vi seg sun when gxi roz ven tuj flank their kav kaj when gxi set gxi lum them el las as ili dorm hollow thereof. This est 1 de di portents. Whomever DI direkt des ver direkt unu whomever Li send astray vi ne trov him direkt teacher
Vi opini ili est awake when ili est en fakt asleep Ni torn them al des tuj flank las flank while their hund strecx his brak their midst! Hav vi rigard them vi fled them stricken terror

When ni resurrected them ili pet each ali "Kiel long hav vi est here? Ni est here 1 tag part de tag ili respond! Your Lord kon put kiel long ni rest here tial send unu de us this mon urb! Let him fetch cleanest food acxet kelk por us! Let him keep low profile attract neni attention
Ili discover vi ili sxton vi force vi revert their religi tiam vi neniam sukces

Ni kauxz them discovered let everyone kon di promes est ver remove all dub end mond! Popol tiam disput themselves them. Kelk dir cxarpent mason them. Their Lord est put knower them! Those prevailed dir Ni cxarpent met worship them

Kelk dir Ili est 3; their hund est 4 while others dir 5; 6 est their hund as ili diven. Others dir 7 8 est their hund. Dir My Lord est put knower de their numer Nur a few kon gxust numer! Do do ne argue them; just ir them! Vi ne konsult anyone this
Vi ne dir vi do anything en des future
Sen dir DI testament vi forges do this vi tuj memor your Lord dir maj my Lord direkt me bon next temp
Ili rest their kav 300 jar increased per
Dir DI est put knower de kiel long ili rest tie Li kon all sekret heavens ter! Per His grace vi seg; His grace vi auxd! tie est neniom Him Lord Mastr Li neniam permes any partners akci His kingship
Vi recite ki revealed vi de your Lord's scripture. Nothing abrogate His vort vi ne trov any ali source gxi

Vi force est those worship their Lord tag kaj nokt, streb Him sol! Ne turn your okul them streb vanities this mond! Nor shall vi obe unu whose kor ni rendered oblivious al our message unu pursues his own dezir priorities konfuz

Proklam This est truth your Lord tiam whoever vol let him kred whoever vol let him disbelieve! Ni prepar transgressors fajr ke completely surround them. When ili scream help ili est don liquid concentrated acid ke brog vizagx! Ki miserable drink! Ki miserable destiny
As por those kred plumb righteous life ni neniam fail recompense those work righteousness
Ili ind gxarden Eden wherein river flu. Ili ornam therein bracelets or wear vest de verd silk velur testament ripoz sur komfort furnishings! Ki wonderful rekompenc; ki wonderful abode
Cite por them ekzempl 2 hom ni don unu de them 2 gxarden grapes surrounded per daktil palm ej ali crops them
Ambaux gxarden produkt their crops sur temp, generously ni kauxz river kur them
Once post rikolt li boastfully told his amik mi est far prosperous than vi mi komand plur respekt popol
When li entered his gxarden li wronged his anim dir mi ne opini this ever end
Ankaux mi opini this est gxi; mi ne pens Hor Hereafter ever ven pas. Eben se mi returned my Lord mi est clever suficx posed a eben bon 1 over tie
His amik dir al him as li debat him vi disbelieved Unu who kre vi polv tiam tiny gut tiam perfekt vi into hom
As por me DI est my Lord mi neniam set any ali di my Lord
When vi entered your gxarden vi dir ‘This est ki DI don me (Maa Shaa Allah)! Ne 1 posed potenc DI La Quwwata Ellaa Bellaah.) '! Vi seg mi posed malpli mon malpli infan than vi
My Lord grant me bon than your gxarden! Li send violent sxtorm cxiel visx out your gxarden las gxi completely barren
its akv sink profund your reach
Ja his crops visx out li ended sorrowful lament ki li spent gxi en vain his property mensog barren Li finally dir Mi wish mi neniam set my property di my Lord
ne force ter help him kontraux DI nor est gxi possible por him ricev any help
Est nur ver Lord mastr est DI; Li proviz bon recompense Him est put destiny
Cite por them ekzempl this life as akv ti ni send cxiel produkt plant ter tiam ili turn into fojn blov vent. DI est able al do all AJX
Mon infan est joys this life righteous works proviz etern recompense el your Lord far bon esper
Tag ven when ni visx mont vi seg ter barren Ni summon them all ne las single 1 de them
Ili prezent your Lord rem. Vi ven us individu just as ni kre vi initially. Ja this est ki vi pretend vol neniam okaz

record montr vi seg kulp fearful de its kontent. Ili dir Ve al us. Kiel ven this libr las nothing small large sen counting gxi? Ili trov cxio ili done brought for! Your Lord est neniam unjust towards anyone
Ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam. Ili fal prostrate Satan. Li igx jinn li disobeyed mend His Lord Vi choose him his descendants as lords Me eben ili est your enemies? Ki miserable substitute
Mi neniam permes them witness creation de heavens ter nor creation de themselves! Nor do mi permes wicked work My kingdom
Tag ven when Li dir Vok My partners vi pretend est di Me ili vok sur them ili ne respond them. insurmountable barrier separate them el each ali
Kulp vol seg Infer realize ili fal gxi! Ili ne hav escape therefrom
Ni cited en this Quran cxiu kind da ekzempl human est est plej argumentative creature
(Nothing prevent popol el kred when guidance ven them streb forgiveness de their Lord ke ili postul seg sam kind da mirakl) previous generaci challenged seg retribution beforehand
Ni nur send messengers simply deliverers bon news tro warners. Those disbelieve argue falsehood defeat truth ili sorb My proofs warnings en vain

Who est evil than those reminded de their Lord's proofs tiam disregard them sen realizing ki ili doing Consequently ni ej sxild their kor prevent them kompren gxi (Quran) deafness their orel! Tiel ne materi ki vi do direkt them ili neniam ever direkt
your Lord est Forgiver plen de mercy. Li vok them kont por their deeds Li annihilate them tre tie kaj tiam Instead Li don them respite specif predetermined temp tiam ili neniam escape
Many community ni annihilated their transgressions; ni designated specif temp their annihilation
Moses dir al his servant mi ne ripoz mi reach pint kie 2 river meet ne materi kiel long gxi pren
When ili reached pint kie ili met ili forges their fisx gxi trov its voj dors river sneakily
Post ili pas ke pint li dir al his servant hav lunch All this vojagx thoroughly exhausted us
Li dir Memor when ni sid rok dors tie Mi ne pag attention al fisx. est diabl far me forges gxi gxi trov its voj dors river strangely
Moses dir est met ni rigard Ili spur their sxtup dors
Ili trov unu de our servants ni ben kun mercy, bestowed him our own knowledge
Moses dir al him mi sekv vi ke vi instru me kelk da knowledge guidance bestowed upon vi
Li dir Vi ne star est me
Kiel vi star ke vi ne comprehend
Li dir Vi trov me DI testament pacient. Mi ne disobey any ordon vi don me
Li dir vi sekv me tiam vi ne pet me anything mi choose tell vi gxi
Tial ili ir. When ili boarded sxip li bor tru gxi. Li dir vi bor tru gxi Did dron its popol? Vi committed io terrible
Li dir mi ne dir vi star cannot est me
Li dir mi est sorry Ne pun me my forgetfulness; ne est tro harsh me
Tial ili ir. When ili met jun knab li killed him. Li dir vi kill such innocent ul who ne kill another ul? Vi committed io horrendous
Li dir mi ne tell vi vi star cannot est me
Li dir mi pet vi pri anything aux tiam do ne keep me vi! Vi seg suficx apologies me
Tial ili ir. When ili reached nepr community ili pet popol food ili rifuz host them! Baldaux ili trov mur collapse li fiks gxi! Li dir Vi postul wage ke
Li dir Nun ni part kompani. Mi eksplik vi cxio vi ne star
As por sxip gxi aparten al poor fishermen mi wanted render gxi defective tie est regx ven post them konfisk cxiu sxip forcibly
As por knab his parents est bon believers ni seg li sxargx them his transgression disbelief
Ni willed your Lord substitute his met another fil; unu est put righteousness kindness

As por mur gxi aparten al 2 orf knab urb. Sub tie est trezor aparten al them. Because their patr est righteous hom your Lord wanted them al kresk ating plen strength tiam ekstrakt their trezor! Such est mercy your Lord Mi did neniom da ke de my own volition. This est explanation ajx vi ne star
Ili pet vi Zul-Qarnain. dir mi narrate vi kelk da his histori
Ni granted him auxtoritat ter proviz him all kinds da means
Tiam li pursued unu voj
When li reached far okcident li trov sun setting vast ocean trov popol tie! Ni dir O Zul-Qarnain vi regul as vi wish either pun est kind al them
Li dir As por those transgress ni pun them; tiam when ili return their Lord Li commit them mult retribution
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev bon rekompenc; ni trakt them kindly
Tiam li pursued another voj
When li reached far orient li trov sun roz popol hav nothing sxirm them el gxi
Naturally ni est fully aware da cxio li trov
Li tiam pursued another voj
When li reached val 2 palisades li trov popol whose idiom est barely understandable
Ili dir O Zul-Qarnain Gog Magog est corruptors ter. Ni pag vi Can kre barrier us them
Li dir My Lord don me great bounties. Vi cooperate me mi cxarpent dam vi them
Bring me mes de glad. Once li filled gap 2 palisades li dir Blov. Once est rugx hot li dir Help me versx gudr gxi
Tiel ili ne grimp gxi nor could ili bor tru gxi
Li dir This est mercy my Lord When prophecy my Lord ven pas Li kauxz dam cxif! prophecy my Lord est truth
Je ke temp, ni let them invad 1 another tiam korn blov ni summon them all together
Ni prezent Infer ke tag disbelievers
Ili est unu okul tro vual seg My message Nor could ili auxd
those disbelieve opini ili get setting My servants di Me Ni prepar disbelievers Infer etern abode
dir mi tell vi mav losers est
Ili est unu works en this life est totally astray ili opini ili doing bon
Such est des unu disbelieved revelations de their Lord en meeting Him! Do their works est en vain Tag Resurrection ili ne hav weight
Their just requital est Infer dors their disbelief kaj por mok My revelations My messengers
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ind blissful Paradise their abode
Forever ili abide therein; ili neniam want any ali substitute
Dir ocean est ink vort my Lord ocean kur out vort my Lord kur out eben se ni double ink supply
dir mi est ne plur than human vi inspir ke your di est 1 di! Those esper meet their Lord work righteousness neniam worship any ali di his Lord
Y ‘A. S. (Kaaf Haa Yaa ‘Ayn Saad)
narration your Lord's mercy towards His servant Zachariah
Li vok his Lord sekret vok
Li dir My Lord ost torn brittle my korp my har est aflame kun griz! As mi implore Vi my Lord mi neniam despair
Mi worry my dependants me my wife est sterile Grant me Vi heir
Let him est my heir heir Jacob's clan far him my Lord acceptable
O Zachariah ni don vi bon news knab nom est John (Yahya). Ni neniam kre anyone him antaux
Li dir My Lord mi hav fil my wife's sterility my old agx
Li dir Tiel dir your Lord est facil Me do Mi kre vi antaux ke, vi est nothing
Li dir My Lord don me sign. Li dir Your sign est ti vi ne parol al popol 3 consecutive nokt
Li ven his famili sanctuary signaled them Medit Di tag kaj nokt
O John vi uphold scripture strongly. Ni dot him kun wisdom, ecx his youth
Kaj (ni dot him kun) kindness el us purity li est righteous
Li honor his parents est neniam disobedient tiran
Pac est upon him tag li est bor, tag li mort tag li resurrected dors life
Menci scripture Mary! Sxi izol her famili eastern location
While barrier apart her el them ni send al her our Spirit Li ir her en form human est
Sxi dir mi streb rifugx en plej Gracious ke vi est righteous
Li dir mi est messenger your Lord grant vi pur fil
Sxi dir Kiel can mi hav fil when ne hom tusx me mi neniam est unchaste
Li dir Tiel dir your Lord ‘Gxi est facil por Me Ni render him sign popol mercy el us. This est predestined materi
When sxi bor him sxi izol faraway met
Nask process ven her trunk palm arb Sxi dir (mi est hont;) Mi wish mi est dead antaux this okaz completely forges
infant vok her her dir ne grieve Your Lord proviz vi stream
Vi sxancel trunk de this palm arb gxi gut ripe dat vi
Mangx trink est felicx! When vi seg anyone dir ‘mi far vow silence mi ne talking hodiaux anyone
Sxi ven her famili port him. Ili dir O Mary vi committed io est totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron your patr ne est mav hom nor est your mother unchaste
Sxi pint him. Ili dir Kiel ni talk kun infant crib
infant parol dir mi est servant DI. Li don me scripture appointed me prophet
Li far me ben wherever mi ir enjoined me observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat) as long as mi viv
Mi est honor my mother Li ne far me disobedient ribel
Pac est me tag mi est bor, tag mi mort tag mi get resurrected
Est Jesus fil Mary this est truth this materi which ili ad dub
Gxi ne befit DI ke Li begets fil Li glor. Al hav anything done Li simply dir al Est gxi est
Li ankaux proklam DI est my Lord your Lord vi worship Him sol! This est dekstr path
(various parti disput themselves regarding identity Jesus). Do ve al those disbelieve sight terrible tag
Wait gxis vi auxd them seg them when ili ven vizagx us! transgressors ke tag totally perd
avert them tag remorse when judgment issued Ili est totally oblivious; ili ne kred
Ni est des unu hered ter everyone gxi; us everyone returned
Menci scripture Abraham; li est saint prophet
Li dir al his patr O my patr vi worship ki can nek auxd nor seg nor help vi en any voj
O my patr mi ricev nepr knowledge ke vi ne ricev. sekv me mi direkt vi rekt path
O my patr ne worship diabl. Diabl ribel kontraux plej Gracious
O my patr mi tim lest vi incur retribution el plej Gracious tiam igx ally diabl
Li dir vi forsaken my di O Abraham? Vi stop mi sxton vi. las me
Li dir Pac est vi. Mi implore my Lord forgive vi; Li est Kind me
Mi abandon vi di vi worship DI. Mi worship nur my Lord Per imploring my Lord sol mi ne ir wrong
Li abandoned them di ili worshipped DI ni granted him Isaac Jacob ni far each da them prophet
Ni dusx them our mercy ni granted them honorable pozici histori
Menci scripture Moses Li devoted li est messenger prophet
Ni vok him dekstr flank Mount Sinai. Ni brought him confer him
Kaj ni granted him our mercy his frat Aaron prophet
Menci scripture Ismail! Li est truthful when li far promes li est messenger prophet
Li uz enjoin his famili observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat;) li est acceptable al his Lord
Menci scripture Idris! Li est saint prophet
Ni raised him honorable rang

These est kelk da prophets whom DI ben Ili chosen descendants Adam descendants de those ni port Noah descendants de Abraham Israel el those ni direkt selected When revelations plej Gracious est recited them ili fal prostrate plor
Post them Li substituted generaci perd Kontakt Prayers (Salat) pursued their lusts Ili sufer consequences
Nur those pent kred, plumb righteous life enter Paradise malplej injustice
Gxarden Eden await them as promes per plej Gracious those worship Him ecx privacy! Certainly His promes ven pas
Ili ne auxd any nonsense therein; nur pac. Ili ricev their provisions therein tag kaj nokt
Such est Paradise; ni grant gxi those our servants est righteous
Ni ne ven ordon your Lord Al Him aparten our preter our future cxio inter them! Your Lord est neniam forgetful
Lord de heavens ter cxio them; vi worship Him steadfastly persevere en worshipping Him! Vi kon de anyone Do egal Him
human est pet "Post mi mort mi ven life
human est forges ke ni Did kre him jam li est nothing
Per your Lord ni certainly summon them together diabl gather them around Infer humiliated
Tiam ni pik each grup plej ardent opponent de plej Gracious
Ni kon plen put those est ind de brul therein
Cxiu single 1 de vi seg gxi; this est irrevocable decision your Lord
Tiam ni rescue righteous las transgressors gxi humiliated
When our revelations recited them clearly those disbelieve dir al those kred Which de us est prosperous? Which de us est majority
Many generaci hav ni annihilated them; ili est powerful prosperous
Dir Those choose ir astray plej Gracious vol plumb them sur gxis ili seg ki promes them! - either retribution Hor. Ke est when ili trov out who really est mav off weaker en potenc
DI EG guidance DE those choose DIREKT. Por bon deeds eternally rekompenc your Lord bring far put returns
Vi not unu rejected our revelations tiam dir mi est don wealth infan
Li seg future Li pren such pledge el plej Gracious
Ja ni record ki li utters tiam commit him al ever-increasing retribution
Tiam ni hered cxio li posed li ven us all sol
